==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|無|舛|t2=steps|ls=i}} – originally a dancer holding two dangling animal skins, roughly [[革]] + [[大]] + [[革]], with dancing steps 舛 below – see [[無#Etymology]] for earlier forms. Top now simplified to 無, and this character is in fact the origin of 無.
